name: Eye of Illusion (Anime)
text:
Equip only to a Illusionist Normal Monster you control. It gains these effects:
? Once while face-up on the field, if this card battles an opponent's monster; neither player takes damage from that battle, also monsters cannot be destroyed by that battle.
? Once while face-up on the field (Quick Effect): Take control of the monster that battled this card when you activated this card's first effect, until the End Phase.
